Except as provided in Section 
43.10.17. the validity of any special tax levied under this Article shall not be contested in any action or proceeding unless the action or proceeding is commenced within 30 days after the effective date of any ordinance or resolution providing for the levy of such special tax. Thereafter, a special tax may be contested only for the purpose of challenging the accuracy of computation of the special tax. Any appeal from a final judgment in the action or proceeding shall be perfected within 30 days after the entry of judgment. Except as provided in Section 
43.10.18. the validity of any bonds issued under this Article shall not be contested in any action or proceeding unless the action or proceeding is commenced within 30 days after the effective date of any ordinance or resolution authorizing the issuance of such bonds. Any appeal from a final judgment in the action or proceeding shall be perfected within 30 days after the entry of judgment. 
(Ord. 216-09, File No. 090938, App. 10/29/2009)
